article_title: Congress Must Question Counterterrorism Policies in Pakistan
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

article_metadata.description: We must continue this momentum by employing a combination of incentives and disincentives to convince Pakistan to take a comprehensive approach to fighting terrorism.
